comments.body: I wonder if this belongs in Material somehow.

I think we use Material in too many places. container:true is relatively heavy-duty, I don't think we want to make it automatic when you insert a new material layer. Might be worth looking at in more detail in a subsequent patch, though.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +97,101 @@        },
        child: new Semantics(
          container: true,
          child: new Material(
            elevation: 6,

comments.body: dismissable is going to try to shrink the width after the snack bar has slid down. That seems a bit weird. Maybe we should have a variant of dismissable that doesn't do that?
Since you have the Theme here, should we also put the theme into the widget tree? That way the content can get to it?
wait, I see you did already. Never mind.
